sentence: Wading into a tight Republican Senate primary in Pennsylvania, former President Donald J. Trump endorsed Mehmet Oz on Saturday, throwing his weight behind the former star of “The Dr. Oz Show,” who has been attacked by rivals as a closet liberal.
title: Trump Endorses Dr. Oz in Pennsylvania Senate Race

sentence: President Trump vows to ‘demand justice for the Jan. 6 prisoners and full protection of their civil rights like was received by ANTIFA, Black Lives Matter who murdered people throughout our country.’ pic.twitter.com/I9VxV5zpjh President Trump: ‘We must ensure that every election can be FULLY and quickly audited.’ pic.twitter.com/9sWhOHumo6 Trump confirmed his endorsement for Dr. Mehmet Oz, in Pennsylvania, who is running for U.S. Senate.
author: DML News App
title: WATCH: Highlights from Trump’s speech at North Carolina rally

sentence: Trump made headlines over the weekend for endorsing Dr. Mehmet Oz for Senate ahead of the Republican primary in Pennsylvania.
author: Alexandra Hutzler
title: Trump Hugely Popular in States With Key Senate Races

sentence: “The Great Commonwealth of Pennsylvania has a tremendous opportunity to Save America by electing the brilliant and well-known Dr. Mehmet Oz for the United States Senate.” Trump’s endorsement touted Oz’s books and television show, and said that “women, in particular, are drawn to Dr. Oz for his advice and counsel”—portraying this quality as one that would help Oz win the election.
author: Paul Blest
title: Trump Endorsed Dr. Oz and Republicans Are Pissed

author: Bryan Anderson
title: Smart tactic or missed opportunity? Budd is the latest GOP frontrunner to avoid debates
